entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • retrieving ?android:attr/textColorPrimary throws an exception #4844
  • FormattedString Spans overlapping #4838
  • Unexpected end of stream on com.android.okhttp.Address@537f9da6 #4836
  • Screenshot doesn't work in older IOS devices #4835
  • xib files broken for .NET 6 IOS #4834
  • [Xaml]Assign to nullable properties #4832
  • Add an overloaded constructor for the requested types to simplify things #4831
  • Use "Razor component" and avoid "Blazor component" #4830
  • Crash when debugging on local device after the splash screen disappear #4824
  • Microsoft.Android.Sdk.Windows\31.0.200-preview.12.2\tools\Xamarin.Android.D8.targets(79,5): error MSB6006: "java.exe" exited with code 1. #4823

Closed

  • [Bug] Android - App stuck at splash screen after clearing data from settings #1787
  • Map Controls.InputView.TextTransform #2990
  • [Bug] Incorrect SupportedOSPlatform attribute? #2235
  • Binding a App, SecureStorage and Preference value #4825
  • [Bug] Title in navigation bar is wrong #2762
  • [Bug] BoxView loses background color when its parent is removed and re-added to the container #3214
  • Error APT2067 failed processing manifest #2500
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Replacing MainPage with a NavigationPage does not work #2517
  • [Bug] Image clipping and sizing doesn't match Xamarin.Forms #2745

PullRequests

Created

  • Force shell creation on UI thread #4845
  • Interfaced handlers for Picker and ProgressBar #4843
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update LayoutHandler to use current conventions #4842
    area/layout 🔲
  • Interfaced handlers for Label, NavigationView, Page #4841
    area/controls 🎮
  • Interfaced IndicatorViewHandler #4840
    area/controls 🎮
  • Menubar #4839
  • [X] Simplify OnPlatformExtension #4829
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Clear focus and hide keyboard submitting the text or disabling the View #4828
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Hide Keyboard in Android Entry and Editor when back key is pressed #4827
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • Interfaced BorderHandler and CheckBoxHandler #4676
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update ImageHandler and ImageButtonHandler to current conventions #4784
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [ci] Add maui release yaml #4775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix tests screenshot #4833
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Implement pending custom WKWebKitDelegate in WebViewHandler #4817
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-webview

Updated

  • Convert dp to px when setting ImageButton.CornerRadius #4820
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Windows] Detect when image failed to load in Windows ImageButton #4816
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Update the DatePicker Dialog if the display info changes #4815
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Refactor Screenshot to use an interface #4699
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement InputTransparent property #4513
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Refactor SecureStorage into an interface #4668
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
